name: A Useless Game (gccalvin)
description:
"A Useless Game" is where you click on squares. Note: The game does have an ending. This game does NOT offer:

- Innovative Gameplay

- Sound

- Music

- Settings

- Main Menu

- Anything useful

This game DOES offer:

- Multiple squares to click

- Multiple colors to see

- A counter to see how many squares you click.

- Useless gameplay

- Anything else?
